FuncDef:
The tariff-queue-mapping enable command enables priority scheduling based on tariff levels.
The undo tariff-queue-mapping enable command disables priority scheduling based on tariff levels.
By default, priority scheduling based on traffic levels is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Priority scheduling is performed on different services of DAA users to ensure that services with higher priorities can obtain sufficient bandwidth.
Prerequisites
A DAA service policy has been created using the value-added-service policy  daa command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
